cars.name: BMW M4 Competition
cars.description: A high-performance sports coupe with aggressive styling, twin-turbocharged engine, and luxury interior.

cars.name: Mercedes AMG GT
cars.description: A luxury grand tourer combining thrilling performance with premium comfort and cutting-edge tech.

cars.name: Ford Mustang Shelby GT500
cars.description: America’s muscle car icon with a supercharged V8 and aggressive styling.

cars.name: Lamborghini Huracán EVO
cars.description: Italian supercar with a naturally aspirated V10, razor-sharp handling, and exotic looks.

cars.name: Ferrari F8 Tributo
cars.description: A breathtaking mid-engine Ferrari with a twin-turbo V8 and track-focused performance.

cars.name: McLaren 720S
cars.description: British engineering masterpiece with a twin-turbo V8, lightweight carbon fiber body, and extreme aerodynamics.

cars.name: Corvette Lineup
cars.description: The Stingray, powered by a naturally aspirated 6.2L V8 engine with up to 495 hp, or the more powerful ZR1 model, which features a ~1,064 hp twin-turbocharged 5.5L flat-plane V8 engine.

cars.name: Porsche 911 Carrera
cars.description: The Porsche 911 Carrera is a performance-oriented sports car characterized by its powerful twin-turbocharged flat-six engine mounted in the rear.

cars.name: Supra
cars.description: The Toyota Supra is a legendary, rear-wheel-drive sports car known for its exhilarating performance and driver-focused design, y.

cars.name: BMW Z4
cars.description: The BMW Z4 is a two-seater sports roadster known for its sleek, progressive design with a long hood, soft-top convertible roof, and powerful engine options that deliver sporty performance.
